1.3.3.name: wordpress/all-in-one-slideshow
1.3.3.description: You can combine 27 transition and 8 easing effects! The plugin comes with package of 8 cufon fonts. You can easlily add new fonts. Choose between arrow and numbered navigation. Or use both at once. Try out how easy it is to customize this slideshow gallery without knowledge of programming. Please, go to the All-In-One Slideshow's page to get more info.
